name: Vooma
headline: Automation platform for logistics
description:
Vooma is the AI agent for logistics. We help our customers automate manual tasks and focus on work that drives business value.

Mike built self driving trucks as a founding engineer at Kodiak Robotics (prev. Uber, Otto) and led their motion planning and safety teams. Jesse grew a private equity backed logistics software company from $2M to $20M+ as CEO.

founders.name: Jesse Buckingham, Founder
founders.description:
Jesse is a co-founder of Vooma, a back office automation platform for logistics.

Prior to Vooma, Jesse partnered with private equity fund Alpine Investors to grow a logistics technology business from $2M to $20M+ ARR and put it on track for a 5-7x+ MOIC. He earned his MBA from Stanford GSB and was a consultant at Bain & Company.

Jesse is a father, husband, avid outdoorsman, fitness enthusiast, and voracious consumer of interesting ideas and literature.

founders.name: Mike Carter, Founder
founders.description: Mike is a co-founder of Vooma, a back office automation platform for logistics. Before Vooma he built self driving trucks at Kodiak Robotics, Uber ATG, Otto, and Stanford's Dynamic Design Lab. He's passionate about pairing rigorous engineering with next-generation automation technologies to drive efficiency in logistics.

## Win and execute more freight
[](https://www.vooma.ai/<#>)
## Free yourself from manual work
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/673e8fc74fefeaba87cf2a76_Receipt.png)
### Vooma Quote
Illuminate the lost revenue in your team's inbox and quote more freight, faster.
[Explore **→**](https://www.vooma.ai/</solutions/quote>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/673e8fc62dfff7a3da9b3303_Stack.png)
### Vooma Build
Eliminate manual load building and reduce data entry errors.
[Explore **→**](https://www.vooma.ai/</solutions/build>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/673e8fc6f594372ff899aff2_Vector%20\(1\).png)
### Vooma Insights
Illuminate the operational and revenue data trapped in your teams inbox.
[Explore **→**](https://www.vooma.ai/</solutions/insights>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/673ea87057e8c258889cfa84_Scratch%20\(9\).png)
COMING SOON

AI powered agents to execute any workflow in your operation.
[Explore **→**](https://www.vooma.ai/</coming-soon/vooma-agents>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/67468df159fe4139b269ea0f_CalendarBlank.png)
COMING SOON

Book better appointments with a fraction of the time and effort.
[Explore **→**](https://www.vooma.ai/</coming-soon/vooma-schedule>)

### Vooma Voice
Voice agents to supercharge your team's capacity.
[Explore **→**](https://www.vooma.ai/</coming-soon/vooma-voice>)
## What our customers say
Vooma’s platform effectively integrates with our systems and allows our team and our customers to gain efficiency, without changing how we do business.We can offload rote tasks to stay focused on customer service and work that requires the human touch, so we can keep building meaningful relationships to drive our business forward.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/673ea9a9689507e39a39676f_1690554160821.jpeg)
Jack Twyman
### Chief Digital Officer, MoLo Solutions
Vooma’s intuitive interface and seamless integration into our tech lets us stay in our inbox to quote by pulling data from different rating sources.We're saving 2-5 minutes per quote which allows to accomplish more in less time with greater efficiency.
![team member](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/6706317ec2535658786b1fef_testimonial%206.jpeg)
Brandon Bay, CTB
### Executive VP, Logistics Group International, Inc.
We have automated order entry to over 93% and moving higher.We have already seen a reduction in errors and the scalability in this process is critical to our rapid growth.
![team member](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/6706317e6f32e9d60c37d20c_testimonial%201.jpeg)
Matt Zimmer
### President, Zengistics
The Vooma team has gone above and beyond to deliver us a seamless quoting experience that is custom to our needs.Vooma has helped us to realize the immense value that LLMs are capable of bringing to us and enriching our existing workflows.
![team member](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/6706317e7cc67b505fd44093_testimonial%202.jpeg)
John Sutton
### Director of Corporate Strategy, Sunset Transportation
Vooma has allowed ShipNova to pull our employees away from unnecessary time spent on mundane order or quote data entry, and instead focus them more into the areas where they shine.
![team member](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/6706317e43b3f70392a6c115_testimonial%203.jpeg)
Travis Green
### Co-Founder & VP Strategy, ShipNova
Automating order entry has become a game changer.The streamlined process has allowed us to focus on what we do best – taking care of our customers and partnerships.
![team member](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/6706317e5d259681ac7d88aa_testimonial%204.jpeg)
Craig Allan
### President, BWS Logistics
We saw Vooma as our first real leap into the practical AI world solving real issues in our business.We can now focus on training employees how to solve real logistical challenges.
![team member](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e102062e9190bd794ba810/6706317edef7a441d930aa82_testimonial%205.webp)
Charles Miller
### CCO, Evans Transportation

generated_description:
Vooma is an innovative startup launched in 2022, currently making waves in the logistics sector by providing an automation platform that utilizes AI agents to streamline operations. Their mission is straightforward: to help logistics companies automate repetitive tasks, allowing teams to focus on activities that genuinely create value. This makes a lot of sense in an industry that’s often bogged down by manual processes.

Founded by Mike, who has a background in developing self-driving trucks, and Jesse, who successfully grew a logistics software firm from $2 million to over $20 million, Vooma combines deep expertise in technology and business growth. They’re based in San Francisco and are part of Y Combinator’s W23 batch—an impressive stamp of credibility.

Vooma recently secured $16.6 million in funding to push their mission forward. So what exactly are they doing? They offer several solutions, notably Vooma Quote for efficient quoting, Vooma Build to streamline load building, and Vooma Insights for better operational visibility. Their upcoming products include Vooma Agents for executing workflows, Vooma Voice for enhanced communication, and Vooma Schedule for simplified appointment management.

Their platform has already resonated well with clients, as many report significant time savings and increased accuracy in their logistics operations. For instance, companies like MoLo Solutions and Zengistics have automated more than 93% of their order entry processes, showcasing the tangible benefits Vooma delivers.

With a small team of three and backing from Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, Vooma is on a rapid growth trajectory in the logistics automation space. As they continue to develop and refine their AI capabilities, you can expect them to further enhance how logistics companies operate—making them faster, smarter, and more efficient.

Want to learn more? Check them out at [Vooma's website](https://www.vooma.ai) and book a demo to see their solutions in action.
